known_issues: Error occurs during "pelepasan ponsel" action; user reports an error with code shown (screenshot referenced).

existing_features.title: Fix the "Release Phone Ownership" flow so that if releasing a phone fails, the UI never displays raw code/JSON/debug output; it must show a clean, user-friendly error message instead and keep the dialog usable.

Harden error handling for the release ownership mutation so it safely extracts a readable message from Internet Computer agent errors (reject message, error objects, unknown thrown values) and maps known backend trap strings (e.g., "Invalid PIN", "You must set a 4-digit PIN...", "Unauthorized...") to consistent English UI messages.

projectName: Fix crash/garbled output when releasing phone ownership
